trans-unit.source: Represents a Workflow role that is backed by a <see cref="T:System.Web.Security.RoleProvider" />.
For more information about roles in ASP.NET, see [Role Providers](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=96709).
trans-unit.target: Дополнительные сведения о ролях в ASP.NET см. в разделе [поставщики ролей](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=96709).

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.WebWorkflowRole" /> class.
A string that defines the name of the role.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.WebWorkflowRole" /> class by using the specified role name.
<paramref name="roleName" /> contains a null reference (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic).
A string that defines the name of the role.
A string that defines the role provider.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.WebWorkflowRole" /> class by using the specified role name and role provider.
The most commonly used role providers for <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.WebWorkflowRole> are classes that inherit from <xref:System.Web.Security.RoleProvider>.
trans-unit.target: Чаще всего поставщиками ролей <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.WebWorkflowRole> являются классы, производные от класса <xref:System.Web.Security.RoleProvider>.

trans-unit.source: These classes include <xref:System.Web.Security.AuthorizationStoreRoleProvider>, <xref:System.Web.Security.SqlRoleProvider> and <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsTokenRoleProvider>.
<paramref name="roleName" /> contains a null reference (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic).
Returns a generic list of ASP.NET accounts associated with the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.WebWorkflowRole" />.
A generic list of string values that represent the ASP.NET accounts associated with the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.WebWorkflowRole" />.
<xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsTokenRoleProvider> supports only <xref:System.Web.Security.Roles.IsUserInRole%2A> and <xref:System.Web.Security.Roles.GetRolesForUser%2A>.

Furthermore, it supports these methods only for the user account that is currently the WindowsPrincipal associated with the request context, so you cannot call <xref:System.Web.Security.Roles.GetRolesForUser%2A> for any user account in the domain.
trans-unit.target: Более того, он поддерживает эти методы только для учетных записей, которые в текущий момент имеют связь WindowsPrincipal с контекстом запроса, поэтому метод <xref:System.Web.Security.Roles.GetRolesForUser%2A> нельзя вызывать для любой учетной записи пользователя в домене.

trans-unit.source: When using the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.WebWorkflowRole.GetIdentities%2A> method with the <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsTokenRoleProvider>, the following provider exception is thrown:
trans-unit.target: При использовании метода <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.WebWorkflowRole.GetIdentities%2A> с объектом <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsTokenRoleProvider> возникает следующее исключение поставщика:

trans-unit.source: The configured Role Provider (WindowsTokenRoleProvider) relies upon Windows authentication to determine the groups that the user is allowed to be a member of.
trans-unit.target: Настроенный Ролевой Поставщик (WindowsTokenRoleProvider) полагается на проверку подлинности Windows для определения групп, членом которых разрешено быть пользователю.

trans-unit.source: ASP.NET Role Manager cannot be used to manage Windows users and groups.
trans-unit.target: Ролевой Менеджер ASP.NET невозможно использовать для управления пользователями и группами Windows.

trans-unit.source: Use the SQLRoleProvider if you want to support custom user/role assignment.
trans-unit.target: Используйте SQLRoleProvider, если желаете внедрить поддержку настраиваемого назначения пользователь/роль.

trans-unit.source: The name of the identity to test for.
Returns a value indicating whether the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.WebWorkflowRole" /> contains the specified identity
<see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.WebWorkflowRole" /> contains the specified identity; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
Gets or sets the name of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.WebWorkflowRole" />.
A string that contains the name of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.WebWorkflowRole" />.
<see cref="P:System.Workflow.Activities.WebWorkflowRole.Name" /> was set to a null reference (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic).
Gets or sets the role provider for the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.WebWorkflowRole" />.
A string that contains the role provider for the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.WebWorkflowRole" />.
The most commonly used role providers for <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.WebWorkflowRole> are classes that inherit from <xref:System.Web.Security.RoleProvider>.
trans-unit.target: Чаще всего поставщиками ролей <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.WebWorkflowRole> являются классы, производные от класса <xref:System.Web.Security.RoleProvider>.

trans-unit.source: These classes include <xref:System.Web.Security.AuthorizationStoreRoleProvider>, <xref:System.Web.Security.SqlRoleProvider> and <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsTokenRoleProvider>.
